articles.title: 'I am more than grateful:' Millions of Americans over 50 may benefit from Biden's student loan forgiveness plan - CNN
articles.description: There are nearly 9 million federal student loan borrowers who are over the age of 50. They account for nearly 20% of the roughly 43 million federal student loan borrowers.
articles.content:
